title: Seeing Early Fruit Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Seeing Early Fruit Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Seeing Early Fruit Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 187
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي ثَمَرِنَا، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي مَدِينَتِنَا، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي صَاعِنَا، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي مُدِّنَا)).
